Donald Charron, 82, died peacefully on Tuesday, July 16, 2024, while listening to Waylon with his loving family at his bedside. The Fall River, MA native was a longtime resident of Savannah. Don lived an uncomplicated life. His passion was his family. He was a proud solider that heroically served in the United States Marine Corp. Until his retirement, Don owned and operated of Don’s Wrecker Service for many years. Don was predeceased by his parents; three sisters, and five brothers. Surviving are his wife of sixty years, Betty Helmley Charron; daughter and son-in-law ...
